title: Introduce deal-dynamics gating/penalty to forecasting and best-next-action scoring

sections.text: Update the scoring pipeline to explicitly down-weight or gate recommendations when negative deal dynamics are present (e.g., late procurement, strong competition, low internal alignment), even for high-fit accounts. Implement a configurable penalty/cap mechanism so a high fit tier cannot exceed a defined score threshold when one or more deal-dynamics risk signals are triggered. Ensure changes apply consistently across both forecasting scores and best-next-action ranking outputs.
